_xResult.title: SANGA Linen Tunic
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made white linen tunic with side slits
_xResult.longdesc:
Be as pure as you please in this custom made linen tunic perfect for summer. This medium-weight linen is perfect over a suit in the summer or to layer up with for interest in the fall. The high slits on the side, round neckline, drop shoulders without sleeves and straight cut design make this made to measure top perfect for any body type. The relaxed fit and simple nature have us craving more simplistic styles in our wardrobe.

 

Shantima uses Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees to you that it meets human - ecological requirements. The fabric is already washed and softened and will shrink no more.
